name: Hot Shot Media
overview:
Hot Shot Media was founded in 2009 by a group of global entrepreneurs from both the online and corporate spaces, collaborating to form a dynamic and enthusiastic team dedicated to aggressively developing and marketing exceptional and unique social projects to the world, free of language, social and cultural barriers.

Hot Shot Media is developing a novel â€˜photo networkingâ€™ platform, creating spontaneous social interaction and representing the best of social networking and photo management in an exciting and distinctive convergence. It is a unique blend of social networking and photo sharing, free of the traditional barriers - be they of language, socio-economic status or culture. Hot Shot Media’s products represent a unique foray into communication beyond classes - where networks are as diverse and multicultural as the world in which they operate.

The Hot Shot Media team is actively creating an engaging virtual community based around a core premise of photo engagement, incorporating a number of highly motivating social games and contests as well as extensive photo management and sharing tools. The staff draw their vast experience from a wide range of backgrounds and proficiencies. Hot Shot Media’s executives have a proven track record in delivering impressive shareholder returns and efficient corporate management, whist the rapidly expanding development team has an extensive set of competencies gained through many years combined experience at the forefront of the online and emerging technology industry.

Hot Shot Media has offices in San Francisco, Singapore and Sydney, and intends to capitalize on the burgeoning Indian and Chinese markets in the near future. The Company has an aggressive development schedule and an eager group of high-profile investors committed to standing with them as they bring their ideas to life.
